name: @clutch/helpers

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && export BABEL_ENV=production && babel src --out-dir dist --ignore 'src/**/*.test.js'
scripts.build:test: rm -rf ./dist && export BABEL_ENV=production && babel src --out-dir dist

description: A collection of helper functions we use at clutch
author: craigpullar <craig.pullar@clutch.ca>
